title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 423/78 of 28 February 1978 amending for the second time Regulation (EEC) No 1297/77 amending for the fourth time Regulation (EEC) No 1019/70 on detailed rules for establishing free-at-frontier offer prices and fixing the countervailing charge in the wine sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 423/78  of 28 February 1978  amending for the second time Regulation (EEC) No 1297/77 amending for the fourth time Regulation (EEC) No 1019/70 on detailed rules for establishing free-at-frontier offer prices and fixing the countervailing charge in the wine sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 1297/77 the date "1 March 1978" is amended to read "1 May 1978".

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1978.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 99, 5.5.1970, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 303, 28.11.1977, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 149, 17.6.1977, p. 10. (4)OJ No L 332, 24.12.1977, p. 33.
